name: Switch (TeamSinoSoviet)
description:
Switch

Tutorial:  WASD to move, LMB to shoot.  Click on an enemy with RMB to switch yourself into them.  Be careful!  You can only maintain control for a certain amount of time.  Switching into an enemy resets this time.  The orange bar indicates the amount of control you have left, while the red bar indicates your health.  Don't let either run out!

Made for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam.  This is the first real game I've ever made, so it would be great if people could provide some constructive criticism.  Thanks!

(Music made by Thrifter Records)
